parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the insulative spray in ECUs/computers can cause the engine to stall, idle erratically, and die without warning, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: engine dying or stalling for no reason with no trouble codes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the exhaust system can cause the engine to stall, idle erratically, and emit toxic fumes into the passenger compartment, leading to accidents or health risks.
symptoms: exhaust odor coming through the front of the car

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Erratic idle and stalling issues can cause the engine to die without warning, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
Timing belt failure can cause the engine to shut down and lose control of steering, leading to accidents.
The failure of the ECM can cause the engine to idle erratically, stall, or surge, leading to accidents, loss of control, and potential harm to the driver and other road users.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Insulation Shrinkage on ECM Circuit Boards
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The shrinkage of the insulation on the ECM circuit boards can cause electrical shorts, leading to ECM failure, engine stalling, and surging, which can result in accidents and loss of control.
The alternator overcharging can cause electrical system failure, leading to ECM failure, engine stalling, and surging, which can result in accidents and loss of control.
The unintended vehicle movement can cause accidents, loss of control, and potential harm to the driver and other road users.
symptoms: Vehicle starts moving on its own

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag to deploy in a crash can lead to serious injuries or fatalities, as the airbag is designed to provide crucial protection to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: Airbag did not deploy in a frontal collision
airbag did not deploy despite significant impact
driver's side airbag did not deploy
passenger's side airbag did not deploy
violent deployment of airbag causing injury.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Erratic Idle and Throttle Control Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The erratic idle and throttle control issues can cause the vehicle to lurch forward or stall, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: and dies; the vehicle fails to start or starts with the check engine light on; the idle drops below 500 RPM and stalls; the idle revs and drops uncontrollably; the vehicle idles above 2000 RPM; the vehicle idles irregularly and requires the driver to keep their foot on the brake to stop the car.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty ECM can cause the vehicle to experience erratic idle, throttle sticking, and stalling, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle's throttle sticks at 2000 RPM; the idle becomes rough
and dies; the vehicle fails to start or starts with the check engine light on; the idle drops below 500 RPM and stalls; the idle revs and drops uncontrollably.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cruise control malfunction can cause the vehicle to accelerate unexpectedly, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The cruise control engages but will not disengage
causing the vehicle to accelerate; the vehicle goes into open throttle position
requiring the driver to apply the brakes hard to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling and idling issues can cause the vehicle to lose power and stall while driving, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine RPM gauge suddenly drops to 0
and the car stalls; the idle also revs on its own
causing the car to jump forward when the speed drops below 30 mph.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: the front tie rod end is torn
the steering column locks up in cold weather

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The airbag deployment can cause injuries to the driver and passengers, and in some cases, lead to infections.
